DOC.brief_summary: This observational study base Register Information Knowledge About Swedish Heart Intensive Care Admissions ( RIKS-HIA ) Swedish Coronary Angiography Angioplasty Registry ( SCAAR ) since 2009 merge The Swedish Web-system Enhancement Development Evidence-based care Heart disease Evaluated According Recommended Therapies ( SWEDEHEART ) . The aim study investigate impact different antithrombotic treatment option ( treatment duration , type treatment combination treatment ) Acute Coronary Syndrome ( ACS ) patient outcomes recurrent ischemic event mortality .
DOC.brief_title: Outcome Longterm Antithrombotic Therapy Acute Coronary Syndrome Patients
DOC.criteria: Patient event ACS study period Patient find National Registry Drug Prescriptions treat treat antithrombotic drug/s ( acetylsalicylic acid and/or either clopidogrel/ticlopidine/prasugrel and/or warfarin ) Patients exclude database fulfill inclusion criterion .
